## Feature Description

Provide a clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see added to the 2048 game.

## Problem Statement

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe. 
Example: I get frustrated when [...]

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you imagine this feature working. Be as detailed as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you thought about alternative solutions or features? 
If so, please describe them and explain why you prefer your proposed solution.

## Impact Assessment

Describe the impact this feature would have on the project:

- **User Experience:** How will this improve the game for users?
- **Code Impact:** Which parts of the codebase will be affected?
- **Performance:** Any performance considerations?
- **Maintenance:** How will this affect future maintenance?

## Visual Examples

If applicable, add mockups, sketches, screenshots, or examples from other games that illustrate your idea.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, references, or examples that may help understand the request:
- Links to similar implementations
- Related issues or discussions
- Use cases or scenarios
